tasks.install: rm -rf ./bin && deno run -A -c deno.json ./scripts/writeTemplate.ts && deno install -A -c deno.json --root . --name punch ./src/index.ts
tasks.compile: rm -rf ./bin && deno run -A -c deno.json ./scripts/writeTemplate.ts && deno compile -A -c deno.json --output bin/punch --reload --include ./src/lib/dev_watcher.ts ./src/index.ts
